ja328:7.3: Yāva byāti nimisati → yava pāti nimmisati (bj) | yāvuppatti nimissati (sya1ed, sya2ed) | yāva pāti nimisati (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja328:7.4: rasatī → saratī vayo (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed) | saratibbayo (pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja328:8.4: vītaṃ ananusociyan”ti → cavitaṃ ananusociyanti (sya1ed, sya2ed) | matantaṃ nānusociyaṃ (mr)
